definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Applicants should not be receiving any other bursary schemes.
sentences.chinese: 申请者不应是其他助学金计划的领受者。

sentences.english: The happiness written on the children's faces shows that the bursaries are making a difference.
sentences.chinese: 孩子的开心写在脸上，证明了助学金真的帮助很大。

sentences.english: Why do you need the Bursary?
These universities online offer financial aid and accredited degrees as well.
sentences.chinese: 这些在线大学同样提供助学金和公认的学历。

sentences.english: Parents bore the brunt of paying for college, followed by scholarships and grants.
sentences.chinese: 大学学费最主要靠父母，而后才是奖学金和助学金。

sentences.english: This might be for a place, a bursary or a scholarship.
sentences.chinese: 这可能是某个地方，助学金或奖学金。

sentences.english: Under existing student aid policies the amount is more than nineteen thousand.
sentences.chinese: 在现有的助学金政策下，此家庭需支付一万九千多。

sentences.english: Do you have any other scholarships or assistantships?
sentences.chinese: 你是否还获得了其它的助学金或奖学金？

sentences.english: The board has decided to withhold part of their grant money from certain students.
sentences.chinese: 委员会决定扣发某些学生的部分助学金。

sentences.english: Bursaries and interest-free loans are available for students who have financial needs.
sentences.chinese: 有经济需要的学生可申请其他助学金及免息贷款。

sentences.english: Consider colleges that offer merit-based scholarships as well as need-based aid.
sentences.chinese: 要考虑学校是否提供奖学金和助学金。

sentences.english: In public four-year institutions, some 4 in 10 undergraduates get financial aid.
sentences.chinese: 在公立大学读四年，有40%的学生会得到助学金。

sentences.english: A donation from HKBU alumni to subsidize students who are in need of financial assistance.
sentences.chinese: 为校友捐款作助学金，旨在资助有经济需要的同学。

sentences.english: What kind of works you will do for this assistantship?
sentences.chinese: 你的助学金是做什么的？

sentences.english: This year 56 awards were granted to students from 13 institutions.
sentences.chinese: 本年度，房协向十三间院校提供了五十六个奖助学金。

sentences.english: We will extend this to cover the rest of the orphans," says S.P. Sriyani Mangalika, the dynamic General Manager of WDF.
sentences.chinese: 我们将扩大这个助学金，以覆盖所有其它的孤儿。

definition: excelling both in morals and studies (idiom); top marks for studies and for behavior (at school)/a paragon of virtue and learning
to donate money/to contribute funds/donation/contribution (of money)
to work part time while studying/work-study program
subsistence allowance/welfare (abbr. for 城市居民最低生活保障[cheng2 shi4 ju1 min2 zui4 di1 sheng1 huo2 bao3 zhang4])
to enter a school or college/to go to school for the first time as a child
